SELECT t1.*, t3.name as orgName, t2.role_id FROM sys_user t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t1.id=t2.user_id left join sys_org t3 on t1.org_id=t3.id WHERE t1.deleted = 0 and t2.role_id = 2 and t2.deleted = 0 and t3.deleted = 0
and t1.username like concat('%',#{query.username},'%')
and t1.mobile like concat('%',#{query.mobile},'%')
and t1.gender = #{query.gender}
select t1.*, (select t2.name from sys_org t2 where t2.id = t1.org_id) orgName from sys_user t1 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.deleted = 0
